title: Experienced Graphic Designer (Product Image Rework)
job_overview:
We’re a high-volume US dropshipping company seeking a skilled **Graphic Designer** to transform and elevate our existing product imagery. You’ll overhaul photos (retouching, compositing, background removal) to boost conversion rates and align with our brand.  

### Key Responsibilities  
- Redesign, retouch, and optimize product images (e-commerce focus).  
- Ensure visuals are consistent, high-quality, and market-ready.  
- Collaborate with marketing/product teams to meet deadlines.  
- Manage large batches of assets efficiently.  

### You Must Have  
- **3+ years professional graphic design experience** (portfolio required).  
- **Expertise in Photoshop, Illustrator**, and photo editing/retouching.  
- Proven ability to rework existing images (show examples).  
- Understanding of e-commerce/dropshipping image standards.  
- Speed, precision, and adaptability in fast-paced environments.  

### Hiring Process  
- Skills assessment (practical image-rework test).  
- Portfolio review + interviews.  

### Apply  
Submit your resume, **portfolio showcasing image-rework projects**, and a brief note on your dropshipping/e-commerce experience
